body_content.explanation: the quality of being made by people, often as a copy of something natural:
examples: As a designer he loves artificiality, like these brightly embellished trees laden with synthetic fruit.
The label saying "out-of-season tulips" emphasizes the artificiality of this highly cultivated flower.

body_content.explanation: the quality of not being real or sincere:
examples: Soap operas use complex characters to distract us from the artificiality of the genre.
There was a nervous artificiality to her laugh.
